title: Smoky Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ['2 litres ketchup', '170g chipotle peppers in adobo sauce', '125ml apple cider vinegar', '175g black treacle', '1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons garlic granules', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground mustard', '1 1/2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 tablespoon sea salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons freshly cracked black pepper', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '250ml whisky', '2 tablespoons hickory flavoured liquid smoke']
